tickets.subject: Network connectivity issues
tickets.description: Customer experiencing intermittent network connectivity problems in their office

messages.text: Hi, I'm having network connectivity issues in my office. The internet keeps dropping every few minutes.

tickets.subject: Software installation help
tickets.description: Customer needs assistance installing new software on their systems

messages.text: Hello, I need help installing Microsoft Office on our new computers.
Hi Sarah! I'd be happy to help you with the Microsoft Office installation. Let me gather some information first.

tickets.subject: Pricing inquiry for cloud services
tickets.description: Customer interested in cloud migration services and pricing

messages.text: Hi, we're looking to migrate our infrastructure to the cloud. Can you provide pricing information?
Hello Mike! I'd be happy to help you with cloud migration pricing. Let me get some details about your current infrastructure.
We have about 50 employees and currently use on-premise servers. We're looking at AWS or Azure.
Perfect! Based on your requirements, I can provide you with a customized quote. I'll send you a detailed proposal via email.
